com.android.server.accounts

Class AccountManagerService

  • java.lang.Object
    • IAccountManager.Stub
      • com.android.server.accounts.AccountManagerService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.pm.RegisteredServicesCacheListener<android.accounts.AuthenticatorDescription>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AccountManagerServiceTest.MyAccountManagerService

    public class AccountManagerService
extends IAccountManager.Stub
implements android.content.pm.RegisteredServicesCacheListener<android.accounts.AuthenticatorDescription>
    A system service that provides account, password, and authtoken management for all accounts on the device. Some of these calls are implemented with the help of the corresponding IAccountAuthenticator services. This service is not accessed by users directly, instead one uses an instance of AccountManager, which can be accessed as follows: AccountManager accountManager = AccountManager.get(context);
